mapper.select: SELECT id, strategy_id, strategy_version, action, test_time, exchange_name, coin, revenue, start_time, end_time, user_id, ecs_task_id FROM test_history WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND strategy_id = #{strategyId} ORDER BY test_time desc LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id, a.strategy_id, a.strategy_version, a.action, a.test_time, a.exchange_name, a.coin, a.revenue, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.user_id, b.version FROM test_history a JOIN strategy b on a.strategy_id = b.id WHERE 1=1 AND a.strategy_id = #{strategyId} ORDER BY a.test_time desc LIMIT 10
